About Me

Hello! I am Pandu Wijaya, a web developer from Indonesia.

I love designing and building websites and applications. My goal is to always build clean coded products with neat-elegant visual, and performance experiences.

1 year after graduating from STMIK-AMIK Riau , I started my career as a web developer at a bank called Bank Duta Kepri until 2019. After that I joined Cargo Community Network as a .Net Developer.

In 2020 I made a huge step, which is becoming a fulltime freelancer. I've helped some companies like Compare Club and Lightsail and join their development team to build products for their clients. So, if you need me to build something that lives on the internet, just contact me
